raw_body: ANTONYPILLAI AUGUSTINE – Beloved husband of late Mary Agnes and loving father of late Joy and Joyce,​ father-in-law of Christine & Ranjan Nadesapillai passed away peacefully at the age of 91. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Parlour,​ Borella. Burial at 4.00 p.m. today (Saturday 12th August 2023) at Borella General Cemetery Roman Catholic Section.050819
